unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi reports a surge in emergency cases following the recent heatwave. As of 17/06/2024, the hospital's emergency department has seen a 30% increase in patients presenting with heatstroke, dehydration, and other heat-related illnesses. Dr. Rajesh Kumar, Head of Emergency Medicine, urges citizens to take necessary precautions.

Doctor Rajesh Kumar, Head of Emergency Medicine, urges citizens to take necessary precautions.
